abstract: A Boolean value that indicates whether the player object renders the receiver’s output.
overview:
## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), the player object handles the rendering of the receiver’s associated output. Change the value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to suppress the rendering of the media data associated with this object.

# suppressesPlayerRendering

**Instance Property**

A Boolean value that indicates whether the player object renders the receiver’s output.

## Declaration

```swift
var suppressesPlayerRendering: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

When the value of this property is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/false] (the default), the player object handles the rendering of the receiver’s associated output. Change the value of this property to [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true] to suppress the rendering of the media data associated with this object.
title: suppressesPlayerRendering
